Question.Subject: Spotify Waiting list?
Question.Content:
Hey all, i am getting really pissed off now with Spotify. I put my name on the waiting list in September 2009 and i still have no invite code... My question is does anyone know how long it will take to get one. Of course someone sending an invite is welcome. Just send it to exterminater700@hotmail.com however i would be satisfied with an eta.
Thanks Adam
Question.ChosenAnswer: This place has some for sale if you want to buy one spotify invite I bought mine there and it worked like a charm! :) No need to wait for months! http://spotify.bigcartel.com/ Cheers

Answer.Content: This place has some for sale if you want to buy one spotify invite I bought mine there and it worked like a charm! :) No need to wait for months! http://spotify.bigcartel.com/ Cheers
